name: Richard Steenken
coverLetter: I have been involved in the Cannabis business for over 25 yrs in one form or another growing indoor/outdoor. I can keep pace with other experienced trimmers 2 lbs. a day consistently. I'm a mature young grandfather drama free looking for full-time trim work Oct-Dec. I would need to car pool with someone or could stay onsite. I have OLCC permit, sissors, trimtray and can start Oct 11th.
